## ğŸ¯ API Dokumentation

### POST `/api/generate`

Generiert Voice Hooks aus Text-Datei.

**Request:**
```typescript
{
  "sessionId": "sess_abc123",
  "hooks": [
    { "id": 1, "text": "Feel the beat drop" },
    { "id": 2, "text": "This is my moment" }
  ]
}
```

**Response:**
```typescript
{
  "success": true,
  "generationId": "gen_xyz789",
  "zipUrl": "https://pub-xxx.r2.dev/downloads/hooks-sess_abc123.zip"
}
```

### POST `/api/webhook`

Lemon Squeezy Payment Webhook Handler.

**Security:** HMAC SHA-256 Signatur-Verifizierung

### GET `/api/download/[sessionId]`

Leitet zu ZIP-Download weiter.

### Cloudflare R2 Setup

   ```bash
   # Dashboard: https://dash.cloudflare.com/r2

   ```

   - Permissions: Object Read & Write
